data.name: Strategic Mind Franchise Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Available Now

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1381850/Strategic_Mind_Fight_for_Freedom/


Games From Strategic Mind Series

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1341170/Strategic_Mind_Spectre_of_Communism/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1200330/Strategic_Mind_Blitzkrieg/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/991810/Strategic_Mind_The_Pacific/


About the Game

Gameplay and cinematics soundtrack of the Strategic Mind Franchise in both MP3 and WAVE formats. All revenue gathered in 2020-2021 from its sales will be spent on creating more tracks that will be added to this very soundtrack without additional fees. Become a supporter who helps us expand the soundtrack.

We have trouble investing a lot into the expansion of the soundtrack, so if you like our job so far, please consider supporting our effort by buying this soundtrack - all net earnings (after tax and Steam share) will be invested into more tracks. We are marking all tracks funded with Soundtrack sales as [Community support] informing you on our progress.

Current content:
27 gameplay tracks and 37 cinematic tracks. (see full list below)

Future content:
New tracks will be added at the time of Strategic Mind: Spirit of Liberty release, in Q1 2022. There will be both Starni Games funded and community-supported tracks. The number of community-supported tracks will depend on the sales of this soundtrack over the course of 2021. We make polls about some of the possible new additions to know your thoughts. You are also free to suggest

Notice! This soundtrack does not include many of the Strategic Mind: The Pacific tracks (it has only 4 gameplay tracks from The Pacific by Rustam Shafigullin), as we do not own the rights for the rest of the tracks, we had a license for 1 commercial product use only. However, starting with Strategic Mind: Blitzkrieg we started using compositions written and performed by Daraba Studio exclusively for our games, so all Blitzkrieg, Spectre of Communism, Fight for Freedom and future tracks will be added to this soundtrack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space
